name: unworkability
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of not being practical or of not being able to be used effectively: She tried to demonstrate the unworkability of the proposed solution. They have introduced a number of new laws without considering their unworkability. Related word
unworkable
More examplesFewer examplesThe people who have supported the new legislation have not considered the unworkability of it.These examples clearly show the unworkability of the bill in its present form.He was able to influence the political discussion in spite of the transparent unworkability of his policies.
